scripts.start: cd server && NODE_ENV=prod TS_NODE_PROJECT=dist/tsconfig.json node -r tsconfig-paths/register dist/server.js
scripts.dev: concurrently "cd server && npm run watch" "cd client && npm run dev"
scripts.install: cd server && npm i && cd ../client && npm i
scripts.build: concurrently "cd client && npm run build" "cd server && npm run build"
